Hi! I am Shataxi Dubey an M.Tech Computer Science & Engineering student at Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar.

My interest area lies in Machine Learning and Computer Vision. 
Currently exploring the Earth through satellite imagery to unveil the hidden patterns and facts.
I am working on my thesis Brick Kiln detection from Satellite Imagery using Vision Language Models under the guidance of [Prof. Nipun Batra](https://nipunbatra.github.io). 

Hoping to add sustainable solutions to make world better!
